name: ConsumerReports
0:
”Alexa, ask Consumer Reports for the top rated washing machine”
”Alexa, ask Consumer Reports about current recalls”
”Alexa, ask Consumer Reports for the latest news”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: consumer reports
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Consumer Reports helps you find the top-rated appliance and tech products for your home. It’s a convenient, hands-free way to access trusted expert reviews and ratings from the independent nonprofit organization that tests over 8,000 products every year. We work side-by-side with consumers to create a fairer, safer, and healthier marketplace. The Consumer Reports Alexa skill is your voice-activated source for finding the right products for your family, from big ticket purchases to the everyday items in between.

Ask Alexa about the best models for your tech, laundry, kitchen, and heating and cooling needs. Hear directly from our testing experts on TVs, refrigerators, washer/dryers, dishwashers, and child safety products like car seats. Get details on pricing, model numbers, and test performance notes. Hear the latest news on national recalls, cars, tech, health, home, and money. You can also listen to the Talking Cars podcast.

To get started, ask Alexa to “Open Consumer Reports”.

If you have questions or feedback related to the Consumer Reports Skill for Amazon Alexa, we’d love to hear from you. Please contact us at Alexa@cro.consumer.org.

****Please note account linking is not required to use Consumer Reports. At this time we are providing a limited number of product reviews within the skill. Product reviews for Cars are not available at this time but News about them is. ****
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
